description: China has begun testing UBTech’s Walker humanoid robots at a border facility near Vietnam, aiming to use them for guiding travellers, managing queues and supporting logistics tasks. The robots, arriving in December, feature autonomous battery-swapping for extended operation. The US$37 million contract reflects Beijing’s ambition to dominate global robotics and AI. The trial complements China’s broader push to introduce robots into public services, from police patrol units to pollution-monitoring machines.
title: China Tests Humanoid Robots to Guide Travellers at Border Crossing

description: China’s Jiangmen Underground Neutrino Observatory has delivered world-class results after only 59 days of data collection, achieving the most precise measurements yet of two major neutrino oscillation parameters. JUNO’s early performance surpasses all previous experiments, confirming a small but intriguing discrepancy between solar and reactor neutrino observations. This tension has renewed speculation about potential physics beyond the Standard Model.
title: China’s Massive JUNO Experiment Delivers Its First World-Class Neutrino Results

description: A new study has linked an unexplained LHAASO detection to a pulsar-powered X-ray nebula, confirming it as a rare PeVatron capable of accelerating particles to extreme energies. The discovery is a major step toward solving the long-standing mystery of galactic cosmic rays. Researchers are now combining X-ray, gamma-ray and neutrino observations to trace these powerful accelerators.
title: X-Ray Nebula Discovery Brings Astronomers Closer to Solving Cosmic Ray Mystery

description: Lily Collins returns in Emily in Paris Season 5, streaming on Netflix. This season blends romance, comedy, and international charm, taking Emily from Paris to Rome and exploring love, friendship, and professional hurdles.
title: Emily in Paris Season 5 OTT Release: Know When, Where to Watch the Romance Comedy Series

description: Raktabeej 2 is generating strong buzz online for its political intensity, powerful performances and layered storytelling. Social media reactions highlight its dark tone, cross-border terrorism angle and solid cast. With an IMDb rating of 6.6 and growing audience interest, the film is expected to perform well on OTT when it arrives on ZEE5 after its theatrical window.
title: Raktabeej 2 OTT Release: Know When, Where to Watch the Bengali Political Action Thriller

description: Aaryan, the 2025 Tamil crime thriller headlined by Vishnu Vishal, has made its OTT debut on Netflix. Now available in five languages, the film follows a gripping chase between a cop and a serial killer who leaves cryptic clues behind. With tense episodes, strong performances, and a surprising twist, Aaryan offers a dark and fast-paced watch. The film's IMDb rating of 5.8/10 reflects mixed reviews, but it continues to spark interest among thriller lovers on OTT.
title: Aaryan Now Streaming on Netflix: Everything You Need to Know About Vishnu Vishal’s Crime Thriller

description: Ravi Teja’s Mass Jathara, after a mixed theatrical run, makes its OTT debut on Netflix. Featuring intense action, emotional layers, and commercial entertainment, the film is attracting fresh digital viewership. Early IMDb reactions sit around 5/10, reflecting mixed yet steady audience interest. Mass Jathara stars Ravi Teja as Lakshman Bheri, Sreeleela, who played the role of Tulsi, and Naveen Chandra as a monstrous antagonist, KG Reddy.
title: Ravi Teja-Starrer Mass Jathara Now Streaming on OTT: Know Where to Watch the Film Online

description: Realme 16 Pro+ 5G and Realme C81 could be launched in India soon, according to a tipster. If this is true, the Realme 16 Pro+ 5G could be the first handset with the Pro+ name since the launch of the Realme 14 Pro+. On top of this, the RAM and storage configurations and colour options of the phones' Indian variants have been leaked by the leaker. The Relame C81 is said to go on sale in the country with only 4G connectivity in two colour options and storage variants. Meanwhile, the Realme 16 Pro+ could feature up to 12GB of RAM and up to 512GB of storage.
title: Realme 16 Pro+ 5G, Realme C81 Storage Variants, Colourways Leaked; Could Launch in India Soon

description: Sennheiser has launched the HDB 630 wireless headphones in India, offering high-resolution audio, advanced tuning tools and up to 60 hours of battery life. Priced at Rs. 54,990, the model is available at a pre-booking price of Rs. 44,990 with bundled Accentum Open earbuds. The HDB 630 features a 42mm transducer, Bluetooth 5.2, adaptive noise cancellation, a parametric equaliser, and support for 24-bit/96kHz playback via USB-C, analogue input or Bluetooth with the included BTD 700 dongle.
title: Sennheiser HDB 630 Wireless Headphones Launched in India With Up to 60 Hours of Battery Life: Price, Features

description: Amazon Black Friday Sale 2025 commenced recently, and is expected to remain live over the weekend. However, the US-based e-commerce platform has yet to announce the date on which its ongoing sale event will be concluded. During Amazon Black Friday Sale 2025, you have the opportunity to get your hands on the best deals on a variety of electronics, like smartphones, smartwatches, tablets, laptops, PCs, smart glasses, washing machines, projectors, smart TVs, refrigerators, geysers, and gaming consoles.
title: Amazon Black Friday Sale 2025: Best Deals on Redmi A4 5G, Redmi 13 5G Prime, Redmi 15, and More Redmi Phones

description: Stanford researchers found that a browser-based tool that reorders posts on X can reduce political hostility. Tested during the 2024 US election, it pushed extreme or partisan content lower in users’ feeds without hiding anything. After ten days, participants reported warmer feelings toward the opposing political side. The study suggests small ranking tweaks may influence attitudes, though findings are limited to the trial’s scope.
title: New Stanford Algorithm Derank Divisive Political Posts on X

description: Oppo Find X9 has now been launched in a new colour option in India. The Oppo Find X9 runs on Android 16-based ColorOS 16.0 and sports a 6.59-inch AMOLED display. It has a MediaTek Dimensity 9500 chipset under the hood alongside up to 16GB RAM and maximum 512GB onboard storage. It carries a 7,025mAh silicon-carbon battery.
title: Oppo Find X9 Velvet Red Colour Option Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Tere Ishk Mein is creating an online buzz after its theatrical release, thanks to the chemistry between Dhanush and Kriti Sanon and the emotional narrative crafted by Anand L. Rai. Audiences are eagerly waiting for its OTT debut, projected for late December 2025 or January 2026 on Netflix. The film has collected good responses on social media and is now in theatres.
title: Tere Ishk Mein OTT Release Date Reportedly Revealed: When, Where to Watch Dhanush, Kriti Sanon Film Online?

description: Legacy Meets Modern: Iconic Sierra design cues retained while adding ADAS L2, 5G connectivity, and a software-driven cabin
title: Old Sierra Emotion, New Sierra Technology: Tata Motors' Vivek Srivatsa Explains the Design Philosophy

description: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold is expected to launch soon. While Samsung remains tight-lipped about the formal launch date, a new leak suggested its price details. The Galaxy Z TriFold may cost less than expected. It is speculated to come with a 9.96-inch display when fully unfolded and could include a 200-megapixel rear camera unit. The Galaxy Z TriFold is likely to be available in select global markets in limited quantities.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold Price Said to Be Lower Than Previously Anticipated

description: The USPTO has issued new guidelines confirming that AI-assisted inventions will be treated like any other under US patent law and that AI systems cannot be listed as inventors. The agency says generative AI should be viewed as a tool, with only humans eligible for inventorship. Earlier proposals for joint inventor standards involving AI have been withdrawn, and examiners will continue applying existing human-focused criteria.
title: US Issues New Patent Guidelines, Says AI Cannot Be Listed as Inventor

description: Bitcoin held near the $91,500 mark on Friday as the broader crypto market continued to consolidate following recent volatility. While major tokens traded in narrow ranges, traders monitored thinning liquidity, ETF flows and global sentiment for direction. Analysts noted that Bitcoin’s stability above key levels supports a cautious short-term outlook, with Ethereum, Solana, XRP and other altcoins also showing muted movement.
title: Bitcoin Trades Near $91,500 as Market Shows Signs of Steady Consolidation

description: Google Pay allow users to add more than one bank account to the platform. This allows you to keep personal and work-related transactions separate and receive payment options easily. Also, during any bank server issues, if one account fails due to network or limit issues, you can use another instantly. Here's a step-by-step guide to add multiple bank accounts to Google Pay:
title: How to Add Multiple Bank Accounts to Google Pay: A Step-by-Step Guide

description: If you want to return a product that you ordered from Amazon, there are multiple ways you can do it. The option to return an Amazon item via the Amazon India website and the mobile app. However, there are certain goods that are deemed unreturnable by the e-commerce giant, like intimate items and consumables. Additionally, Amazon only allows customers to return an order for up to 10 days. The status of your returned order can be tracked on the company's website and mobile app.
title: How to Return an Item on Amazon India: Step-by-Step Guide With Pickup and Refund

description: The OnePlus 15, already launched in India and other markets, is finally nearing its US debut after reportedly securing FCC certification under the identifier CPH2749. The approval removes the last regulatory obstacle, though OnePlus has yet to issue an official update. The phone features a 6.78-inch QHD+ 165Hz AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chip, up to 16GB RAM, a 50-megapixel triple rear camera setup, and a 7,300mAh battery with 120W wired and 50W wireless charging.
title: OnePlus 15 Reportedly Bags FCC Certification Hinting at Imminent Launch in the US

description: Epic CEO Tim Sweeney says AI labels on video games are unnecessary, arguing that most future titles will use the technology in some form. His comments follow platforms like Steam adding “Made with AI” tags, which some see as important disclosures. The industry remains divided, with some creators wary of AI’s impact on artistry while others embrace it for tasks like voice work and asset creation.
title: Epic CEO Tim Sweeney Is Not a Fan of AI Tags in Video Games; Explains Why

description: Meta Platforms has announced support for additional Indian languages across Instagram, Facebook and the Edits app. The update was revealed at the House of Instagram event in Mumbai on Friday. According to the company, the rollout is aimed at helping creators reach wider audiences and engage more effectively. Meta AI Translations is also expanding to new languages, including Bengali, Marathi and Telugu.
title: Instagram Expands Meta AI Translations to New Languages, Rolls Out New Indian Fonts on Edits App

description: Nothing Phone 3a Lite India-exclusive drop event will be hosted by the UK-based smartphone maker on November 29 at 3pm IST in New Delhi's Greater Kailash 2. The company has announced that the first 20 Nothing Phone 3a Lite customers will get a pair of Nothing Ear Open true wireless stereo (TWS), too. Meanwhile, the handset is scheduled to go on sale for the rest of the country on December 5 via Flipkart, Vijay Sales, Croma, and other leading retailers. Launched in India on November 27, it packs a 5,000mAh battery.
title: Nothing Phone 3a Lite to Go on Sale in Delhi at Exclusive Drop Event Set For November 29

description: Unique Identification Authority of India (UIDAI), on Friday, announced a new feature for the new Aadhaar app. The app, which was launched on Android’s Play Store and iOS’ App Store on November 9, will soon support mobile number updation. The new capability will require users to share one-time password (OTP) and face authentication to link a new number to the app.
title: UIDAI Says New Aadhaar App Will Soon Allow Users to Update Mobile Numbers

description: Amazon Black Friday Sale 2025 is currently live in India. Customers can grab deals and offers on popular smartphone models from iQOO in the ongoing sale. iQOO's different Z and Neo series smartphones are listed with price cuts. Buyers can also get exchange offers and payment discounts. Shoppers can also get EMI plans and coupon discounts.
title: Amazon Black Friday Sale 2025: iQOO Z10x, iQOO Neo 10R and More Smartphones Go on Sale at Discounted Prices

description: Google's Gemini 3 model was recently launched. Now, a report highlights that the company has reduced Thinking with 3 Pro mode rate limits for users without a Google AI Pro plan. The change is said to have happened after the rollout of the tech giant's most advanced and capable AI model. Separately, the company has also removed free access to Infographics and Slide Decks features in NotebookLM due to increased demand. This is a temporary rollback, and is planned to be released again in the future to free users.
title: Google Reportedly Changes Free Access Limits for Thinking With Gemini 3 Pro AI Model

description: Oppo A6x is rumoured to debut soon, with a new leak suggesting a starting price of Rs. 12,499 for the 4GB + 64GB variant. The 4GB + 128GB and 6GB + 128GB models may cost Rs. 13,499 and Rs. 14,999, respectively. Expected specifications include a 6.75-inch HD+ 120Hz display, Dimensity 6300 chipset, 13-megapixel dual rear camera setup, 6,500mAh battery with 45W charging, IP64 rating, and a pill-shaped camera module.
title: Oppo A6x Price in India, RAM and Storage Options Leaked Ahead of Anticipated Launch

description: Google introduced a new Power Saving Mode in Google Maps earlier this month. This feature, designed to conserve battery life during navigation, started reaching more devices. Google Maps switches to a black-and-white interface in this mode. It displays essential information. The feature is only available in Pixel 10 series smartphones.
title: Google Maps Updated With Power Saving Mode; Know How to Use It on Your Pixel 10 Series Smartphone

description: OpenAI appears to be testing a new version of ChatGPT’s image generator that lets users pick preset styles, similar to the Sora app. Leaked screenshots show a banner referencing faster generation and more consistent editing, along with visual cards for trending styles such as Crayon and Chibi. The feature has surfaced for some users, though it has not yet been officially announced.
title: OpenAI Tipped to Upgrade ChatGPT’s Image Generator With Preset Styles

description: The Realme 16 Pro, expected to succeed the Realme 15 Pro 5G, has appeared on China’s TENAA and MIIT sites, revealing a flat 6.78-inch 1.5K OLED display with a 144Hz refresh rate and a redesigned square camera module. It may feature a 200-megapixel dual rear setup, 50-megapixel selfie camera, 2.5GHz chipset, and Android 16-based Realme UI 7. The phone is tipped to include a 7,000mAh battery with 80W charging, an in-display fingerprint sensor, an IR blaster, and up to 12GB RAM with 512GB storage.
title: Realme 16 Pro Design, Key Specifications Revealed via TENAA, MIIT Certification Wesbites

description: Realme C85 5G has been launched in India. The new smartphone packs a 7,000mAh battery and a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset. It will be available in the country via the company’s online store and Flipkart. The tech firm will offer its new C series handset in two colourways and RAM and storage variants. Realme's C85 5G ships with an IP69 Pro rating for dust and water resistance, which is claimed to offer resistance against 36 types of liquids. The display of the phone can refresh at up to 144Hz, while providing 1,200 nits of peak brightness.
title: Realme C85 5G Launched in India With Dimensity 6300 SoC, 7,000mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: Ubisoft has no plans to release a second expansions for Assassin's Creed Shadows at the moment. The developer said that it was not planning a second story DLC the size of Claws of Awaji. Assassin's Creed Shadows first story DLC was released in September.
title: Ubisoft Has No Plans for a Second Assassin's Creed Shadows Expansion

description: The Vivo S50 series is set to launch in China in December and will include the Vivo S50 and Vivo S50 Pro Mini. Ahead of the announcement, the company has shared key details about the Pro Mini model. The handset is confirmed to run on Qualcomm’s latest Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset and will feature a dual rear camera setup led by a Sony IMX882 sensor.
title: Vivo S50 Pro Mini Specifications Revealed Ahead of China Launch; to Come With Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 Chip

description: Amazon Black Friday Sale 2025 was kicked off recently. The e-commerce giant’s latest sale event brings discounts on various electronics, like phones, smartwatches, smart glasses, Bluetooth speakers, PC, laptops, smart TVs, refrigerators, washing machines, and projectors. While it is expected to conclude soon, the company has yet to announce the sale event's end date. Axis Bank, Bank of Baroda, and HDFC Bank credit and debit card holders can get an instant discount of 10 percent while purchasing their next Samsung smartphone.
title: Amazon Black Friday Sale 2025: Best Deals on Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy A55, Galaxy M17 5G, and More Phones

description: Amazon Black Friday Sale 2025 has started in India with discounts on smartphones and other electronic items. The discount sale offers up to 80 percent price cut on smartphones. OnePlus is selling its OnePlus 15, OnePlus 13 and Nord series smartphones at discounted prices in the ongoing sale. Further, shoppers can get payment-based discounts.
title: Amazon Black Friday Sale 2025: OnePlus 15, OnePlus 13s, Nord 5, More Available With Discounts

description: iPhone Air, the company's slimmest smartphone to date, launched alongside the iPhone 17 series as Apple’s thinnest and lightest model. The handset is now discounted by up to almost Rs. 13,000 during Reliance Digital’s Black Friday 2025 Sale. The 256GB variant is priced at Rs. 1,09,990, the 512GB model at Rs. 1,28,990, and the 1TB option at Rs. 1,46,990. Originally starting at Rs. 1,19,900, the phone features a 5.6mm profile, 165g weight, and comes in Cloud White, Light Gold, Sky Blue, and Space Black.
title: iPhone Air Price in India Drops By Nearly Rs 13,000 During Reliance Digital Black Friday Sale

description: Apple will open a new retail store in India next month, the company announced on Friday. The new Apple Store will be located in Noida and will officially open its doors on December 11. It is expected to be the Cupertino-based tech giant's second store in the Delhi-NCR region after Apple Saket, which was inaugurated in 2023. According to a report, Apple is also planning its expansion in Mumbai and could announce a second store next year.
title: Apple Set to Launch 5th India Store in Noida on This Date; Mumbai's Second Store Slated for 2026

description: The iPhone 16 is currently available at a reduced price on an e-commerce platform, courtesy of the Black Friday Sale. Amazon has introduced a discount on the Apple handset, considerably lowering the price from its usual market rate. Alongside direct discounts, the e-commerce giant is also extending bank offers, exchange bonuses and additional deal benefits on the iPhone 16 to further sweeten the deal and reduce the price.
title: Black Friday Sale: iPhone 16 Available at a Lower Price With Discounts, Other Offers on Amazon

description: Apple is poised to top the list of best-selling smartphones in the global markets in 2025, according to a report by a market research firm. The Cupertino-based tech giant is estimated to have a 19.4 percent market share, overtaking Samsung as the global leader in terms of smartphone shipments. The China-based original equipment manufacturers (OEMs), meanwhile, may have mixed fortunes, with a weakened domestic market, supply-chain issues, and increasing competition throttling their growth.
title: Strong iPhone 17 Sales to Help Apple Surpass Samsung as Global Leader in Smartphone Shipments: Report

description: Several brands now offer curved-display smartphones under Rs. 20,000, bringing premium design and AMOLED panels to the budget segment. Leading options include the Moto G96 5G, Vivo T4R 5G, Infinix Note 50s 5G+, iQOO Z10R 5G and Realme P3 Pro 5G. These phones feature high-refresh-rate curved screens, large batteries, capable midrange chipsets and high-resolution cameras. Most models also offer fast charging, IP ratings and AI-powered imaging features, giving users a strong mix of style, performance and value at this price point.
title: Best Curved Display Smartphones Under Rs 20,000: Moto G96 5G, Infinix Note 50s 5G+, iQOO Z10R and More
